metadata.title: Wednesday, 23rd October, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when the Government will resurface the uneven stretch on the Great East Road (GER) between the Palm Drive-GER Junction in Chelstone and the Airport Roundabout.

parts: (a)when the construction of a clinic at Chungolungo in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency will be completed; and
(b)what has caused the delay in completing the project.
(a)when the construction of the Luakela-Kakoma road, by the Disaster Management and Mitigation Unit, in Mwinilunga District will be completed; and
(b)what the total cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the D273 road leading to the site for the 40 Mega Watts Hydropower Station project by the Copperbelt Energy Corporation in Mwinilunga District in order to ensure timely completion of the project.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply - Motion (11th October) - Resumption of Debate.
